trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the **RowUpdating** event of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il **RowUpdating** evento di un provider di dati .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: The `RowUpdating` event is typically raised just before an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row begins.
trans-unit.target: Il `RowUpdating` viene in genere generato immediatamente prima che un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>a una riga.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> da eseguire quando <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di istruzione SQL da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> da inviare attraverso un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> object for an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> oggetto per un'istanza di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: This method allows implementations to perform type checking for the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object assignment.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente alle implementazioni di controllo del tipo per eseguire il <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>assegnazione dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: Only valid <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> objects, for example a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, should be permitted.
trans-unit.target: Valido solo <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>oggetti, ad esempio un <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>di oggetto, deve essere consentito.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> da eseguire durante la <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> da eseguire durante la <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>operazione.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> da eseguire durante la <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutti gli errori generati dal provider di dati .NET Framework quando il <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>esegue.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
trans-unit.target: Gli errori generati dal provider di dati .NET Framework quando il <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>esegue.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that will be sent to the server as part of an insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> che verranno inviati al server come parte di un'operazione di inserimento, aggiornamento o delete.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> da inviare attraverso un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di istruzione SQL da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: StatementType can be one of the following values: - Select - Insert - Update - Delete
trans-unit.target: StatementType può essere uno dei valori seguenti: - selezionare - inserimento - aggiornamento - eliminazione

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di istruzione SQL da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> del <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>proprietà.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> per l'invio tramite <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"> </xref> per l'invio tramite <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>
